articles.description: Is anything about drawn Test matches more irritating than how irritated everyone seems to get by them?
articles.content: For all the damnation and disappointment sparked by the inevitability of the result, there was something fitting about last weeks first Test between Pakistan and Australia ending in a draw. This, aft… [+5900 chars]

articles.title: ICC Women's World Cup 2022: How Points Table Looks After England's Win Over India - NDTV Sports
articles.description: ICC Women's World Cup 2022: The England women's cricket team climbed to the sixth spot in the latest points table after registering their first win in the tournament against India on Wednesday.
